column1: 30344,Cable (2008) #22,22,28414,69,"PRELUDE TO ""X-MEN: SECOND COMING"" EVENT! The penultimate chapter in the X-Men saga that began with ""Messiah CompleX"" continues here! Now that Hope's told Cable that she's ready to join the X-Men in the present, Cable risks it all to repair his busted time machine. Finally, after years of being stuck in a one-way trip to oblivion, Cable and Hope leap into the past.  But the Mutant Messiah and her surrogate father miss the mark by more than a few hundred years, finding themselves in a primitive Manhattan - and hunted by a mutant who just doesn't know the meaning of the word ""quit."" Rated T  ...$2.99",
